name: OozGlorp in the Dungeon of Zlorx
name_original: OozGlorp in the Dungeon of Zlorx
description:
The slime known as OozGlorp are failed magic experiments from the grand wizard Zlorx's laboratory.  As such they are extremley unstable and will explode moments after they leave thier ooze pipes. The only thing that can delay thier inevitable destruction is extra magic glorp, found in bottles littering Zlorx's dungeon. The only way to stabalise thier condition is to exposes them to pure sunlight.

Get to the top of the dungeon of Zlorx and stabalise your condition... good luck.

Made for Ludum Dare 50

WASD / Arrow Keys /  Left Joystick / D-Pad  - Move

R / View -  Restart

Space / South Button  -Jump
